content: totoro labubu costume free pattern @knitworkz materials & tools abbreviations magic_ring magic_ring  5 ply yarn chain chain single_crochet single_crochet skip skip a stitch  5mm round eyes x2 increase increase  3mm hook  needle decrease decrease  uhu glue double_crochet double_crochet  stitch marker decrease double_crochet 2 stitches together half_double_crochet half_double_crochet hdcinc 2 half_double_crochet in same stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch blo back loop only single_crochet blo single_crochet on back loop only increase blo two single_crochet on back loop * … repeat instructions with the indicated number of times … total number of stitches @knitworkz labubu shirt use 3mm hook grey and white color yarn note do slip_stitch on blo at the end of each row r1 34ch form a circle with slip_stitch 34 then do 3ch 34dc r2-3 3ch 34dc 34 r4 3ch 2dc decrease 26dc decrease 2dc 32 r5 3ch 8dc 4ch 4sk 8dc 4ch 4sk 8dc 32 r6 2ch 5hdc 7sc 8slst 7sc 5hdc 32 weave in all ends @knitworkz sleeve x x x x x x x x use 3mm hook and grey color yarn x x x x note do slip_stitch on blo and chain 1 at the end of each start row start a new yarn on bottom second stitch r1 2sc flo bottom 2sc on the double_crochet left 12 4sc on the chain top 2sc on the double_crochet right 2sc flo bottom refer to image on the right r2-3 12sc 12 weave in all ends stomach use 3mm hook and white color yarn r1 3ch 12dc in magic_ring 12 r2 2ch 12hdcinc 24 weave in all ends use 2 ply grey color yarn to sew 5 ^ and glue on the shirt @knitworkz hat use 3mm hook and grey color yarn note do slip_stitch on blo at the end of each row r1 3ch 12dc in magic_ring 12 r2 3ch 12 * dcinc 24 r3 3ch 12 * double_crochet dcinc 36 r4 3ch 36dc 36 r5 3ch 6dc 12ch 12sk 9dc 6sc 3dc 36 r6 3ch 6dc 12dc on chain 6dc 24 r7-8 2 row 3ch up and turn 24dc 24 cut and weave in all ends eye x2 use 3mm hook and white color yarn r1 8sc in magic_ring weave in all ends and glue on the hat glue 5mm eye on it @knitworkz ear x2 use 3mm hook and grey color yarn note work in continuous round r1 4sc in magic_ring 4 r2 4sc 4 r3 2 * single_crochet increase 6 r4 6sc 6 r5 2 * 2sc increase 8 r6 2 * 3sc increase 10 r7-8 2 row 10sc 10 r9 2 * 3sc decrease 8 r10 8sc 8 cut and leave a long tail to sew to the hat fold it flat @knitworkz leaf use 3mm hook and green color yarn r1 6ch start from second chain from hook do single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet weave in all ends and glue on the hat tail use 3mm hook and grey color yarn note work in continuous round r1 6sc
